Description: GoCardless makes collecting money by Direct Debit easy for everyone from individuals to multi-national corporations. This is for sandbox access only.
Name: GoCardless Sandbox

Methods.Name: Disable Bank Account
Methods.Description: Disables a customer bank account which immediately cancels all associated mandates and cancellable payments.

Methods.Name: List Bank Accounts (Customer)
Methods.Description: Returns a list of all bank accounts for the specified customer.

Methods.Name: Get Bank Account
Methods.Description: Returns the details of a specific bank account.

Methods.Name: Create Bank Account
Methods.Description: Creates a new corporate customer.

Methods.Name: List Bank Accounts (All)
Methods.Description: Returns a list of all bank accounts.

Methods.Name: Cancel Subscription
Methods.Description: Cancels a subscription.

Methods.Name: Create Subscription
Methods.Description: Creates a subscription which is a schedule of payments.

Methods.Name: List Subscriptions (All)
Methods.Description: Lists all subscriptions.

Methods.Name: List Subscriptions (Customer)
Methods.Description: Lists all subscriptions for the specified customer.

Methods.Name: List Payments (All)
Methods.Description: Lists all payments.

Methods.Name: Cancel Payment
Methods.Description: Cancels a payment.

Methods.Name: List New Payments (Customer)
Methods.Description: Lists all payments for the specified customer created since the last run.

Methods.Name: List Payments (Customer)
Methods.Description: Lists all payments for the specified customer.

Methods.Name: List New Payments (All)
Methods.Description: Lists all payments created since the last run.

Methods.Name: Get Payment
Methods.Description: Gets details of a payment.

Methods.Name: Create Payment
Methods.Description: Creates a new payment object. Payments can be created against 'pending submission' and 'submitted' as well as 'active' mandates.

Methods.Name: Create Customer (Company)
Methods.Description: Creates a new corporate customer.

Methods.Name: Create Customer (Individual)
Methods.Description: Creates a new private individual customer.

Methods.Name: List Customers
Methods.Description: Updates details on the Customer record.

Methods.Name: Get Customer
Methods.Description: Returns details about a single Customer .

Methods.Name: Update Customer
Methods.Description: Updates details on the Customer record.

Methods.Name: Get Mandate
Methods.Description: Gets details of a Mandate.

Methods.Name: List Mandates (Customer)
Methods.Description: Lists all Mandates for the specified customer.

Methods.Name: List Mandates (All)
Methods.Description: Lists all Mandates.

Methods.Name: Cancel Mandate
Methods.Description: Cancels a Mandate.

Methods.Name: Create Mandate
Methods.Description: Creates a new mandate.

Methods.Name: Mandate Created
Methods.Description: Triggers when a mandate is created.

Methods.Name: New Event
Methods.Description: Reports when an event occurs to a mandate or payment.

Methods.Name: Payment Created
Methods.Description: Triggers when a payment is created.

Methods.Name: List New Refunds
Methods.Description: Lists refunds created since the last run.

Methods.Name: Update Refund
Methods.Description: Updates the metadata fields (custom fields) of a refund. Request fields must be added as custom fields with the field location refunds.metadata.<key> (example: refunds.metadata.myField).

Methods.Name: Get Refund
Methods.Description: Retrieves the details of the specified refund.

Methods.Name: Create Refund
Methods.Description: Creates a new refund object.

Methods.Name: List Refunds
Methods.Description: Lists all refunds.

Methods.Name: List Payout Items
Methods.Description: Lists all payout items for the specified payout.

Methods.Name: List Payouts
Methods.Description: Lists all payouts.

Methods.Name: List New Payouts
Methods.Description: Lists all payouts created since the last run.

Methods.Name: Update Payout
Methods.Description: Updates the metadata fields (custom fields) of a payout. Request fields must be added as custom fields with the field location payouts.metadata.<key> (example: payouts.metadata.myField).

Methods.Name: Get Payout
Methods.Description: Retrieves the details of the specified payout.

MetaTile: GoCardless Sandbox Integration - Billing Automation - Cyclr
MetaDescription: Pass and sync your GoCardless test environment data to your business applications, letting you set up business automation workflows to streamline your billing cycle.
